| number_of_films = 196 as actress, 9 as director (per [[Internet Adult Film Database|IAFD]])

'''Britt Morgan''' (born August 12, 1963) is a former [[Pornographic film actor|pornographic actress]].<ref name="iafd">{{cite web|title=Personal Bio Britt Morgan|publisher=IAFD|url=http://www.iafd.com/person.rme/perfid=BMorgan/gender=f/Britt-Morgan.htm |accessdate=2007-10-12}}</ref>

She is a member of the [[List of members of the AVN Hall of Fame|AVN Hall of Fame]].<ref name='AVN HOF'>{{cite news|title=AVN Hall of Fame|url=http://www.avnawards.com/index.php?content=halloffame |accessdate=2008-01-02}}</ref>

==Awards==
* 1990 [[AVN Award]] – Best Screenplay, Video (''Cheeks II: The Bitter End'') with [[Jace Rocker]]<ref>{{cite web|url=http://avnawards.avn.com/past/winners/1990 |title=AVN Awards Show - History |date= |accessdate=2014-01-18 |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20131205023637/http://avnawards.avn.com/past/winners/1990 |archivedate=2013-12-05 |df= }}</ref>
* 1992 AVN Award – [[AVN Award for Best Supporting Actress|Best Supporting Actress&mdash;Film]] (''On Trial'')<ref name=avn92>{{cite web|url=http://avnawards.avn.com/past/winners/1992 |title=AVN Awards Show - History |date= |accessdate=2014-01-18 |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20131231000938/http://avnawards.avn.com/past/winners/1992 |archivedate=2013-12-31 |df= }}</ref>
* 1992 AVN Award – Best Screenplay, Video (''Cheeks IV: A Backstreet Affair'') with [[Jace Rocker]]<ref name=avn92/>
* 2002 AVN Award – Best Art Direction, Video (''Wonderland'')<ref>{{cite web|url=http://avnawards.avn.com/past/winners/2002 |title=AVN Awards Show - History |date= |accessdate=2014-01-18 |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20131204223517/http://avnawards.avn.com/past/winners/2002 |archivedate=2013-12-04 |df= }}</ref>
